test_description: Verify automated routing of service request using PostGIS point-in-polygon logic
business_risk: Critical - Misrouting leads to service delays and contractual violations
preconditions: Service Center with defined Polygon Area exists; User address geocoded to lat/long inside polygon
test_steps: 1. User creates service request with address; 2. System geocodes address; 3. System executes ST_Contains query; 4. System assigns Service Center ID
expected_result: Service Request is assigned to the Service Center whose polygon contains the user coordinates
test_data_needs: GeoJSON Polygon for Service Center; Lat/Long User Coordinates; Brand Authorization link

test_description: Verify offline job completion and synchronization upon network restoration
business_risk: High - Data loss of service records and customer signatures
preconditions: Technician logged in; Job in 'Work In Progress'; Device in Airplane Mode
test_steps: 1. Enter completion notes; 2. Capture signature; 3. Tap Resolve; 4. Verify local queue; 5. Restore Network
expected_result: Data persists locally; Background sync triggers on connect; Server updates status to 'Resolved'
test_data_needs: Assigned Service Request; Mock Signature Data
success_criteria: Zero data loss; Sync completes within 30s of reconnection
accessibility_requirements: Offline status indicator announced by VoiceOver
